alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 9:14PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun, eastern Lexington, southwestern Sumter and southeastern Richland Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Congaree National Park, or near McEntire Air Base, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McEntire Air Base, Eastover, Gadsden, Poinsett State Park, Congaree National Park, Sandy Run, Millwood, Cane Savannah, Wedgewood, Fort Motte, and Stateburg. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 126 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
